channel.title: Others on Aiman
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Aiman

item.title: Fear is Sweet( translated)
item.description: Love is delicious like fear—fear of the jinn who hide in mountain bends on a rural night. A fear that tickles you and pulls you away from the monotony of the known, making you want to stay on its edges and weave dreams from there. But you grew up a little and dared a lot against the jinn’s myths and your grandmother’s warnings. You went to their mountainous death in the midst of the night, and you didn’t see the jinn. You became brave and dry from dreams.
